Mixed Layer#

class abcmodel.mixed_layer.BulkMixedLayerInitConds(abl_height, theta, dtheta, wtheta, q, dq, wq, co2, dCO2, wCO2, u, du, v, dv, dz_h, surf_pressure, wstar=0.0, we=-1.0, wCO2A=0.0, wCO2R=0.0, wCO2M=0.0, thetav=nan, wthetav=nan, wqe=nan, qsat=nan, e=nan, esat=nan, wCO2e=nan, wthetae=nan, dthetav=nan, wthetave=nan, lcl=nan, top_rh=nan, utend=nan, dutend=nan, vtend=nan, dvtend=nan, htend=nan, thetatend=nan, dthetatend=nan, qtend=nan, dqtend=nan, co2tend=nan, dCO2tend=nan, dztend=nan)[source]#

Data class for bulk mixed layer model initial conditions.

  • theta (-)

  • dtheta (-)

  • wtheta (-)

  • dq (-)

  • co2 (-)

  • dCO2 (-)

  • du (-)

  • v (-)

class abcmodel.mixed_layer.BulkMixedLayerModel(divU, coriolis_param, gammatheta, advtheta, beta, gammaq, advq, gammaCO2, advCO2, gammau, advu, gammav, advv, dFz, sw_shearwe=True, sw_fixft=True, sw_wind=True)[source]#

Bulk mixed layer model with full atmospheric boundary layer dynamics.

Complete mixed layer model that simulates atmospheric boundary layer evolution including entrainment, subsidence, cloud effects, and wind dynamics.

Parameters:

  • sw_shearwe (-)

  • sw_fixft (-)

  • sw_wind (-)

  • surf_pressure (-)

  • divU (-)

  • coriolis_param (-)

  • gammatheta (-)

  • advtheta (-)

  • beta (-)

  • gammaq (-)

  • advq (-)

  • gammaCO2 (-)

  • advCO2 (-)

  • gammau (-)

  • advu (-)

  • gammav (-)

  • advv (-)

  • dFz (-)

  • Processes

  • ---------

  • effects. (1. Calculate large-scale vertical motions and compensating)

  • parameters. (2. Determine convective velocity scale and entrainment)

  • variables. (3. Compute all tendency terms for mixed layer)

  • time. (4. Integrate prognostic equations forward in)

calculate_convective_velocity_scale(abl_height, wthetav, thetav, g)[source]#

Calculate convective velocity scale and entrainment parameters.

static calculate_entrainment_fluxes(we, dtheta, dq, dCO2)[source]#

Calculate all entrainment fluxes.

calculate_entrainment_velocity(abl_height, wthetave, dthetav, thetav, ustar, g)[source]#

Calculate entrainment velocity with optional shear effects.

calculate_free_troposphere_compensation(ws)[source]#

Calculate compensation terms to fix free troposphere values.

calculate_mixed_layer_tendencies(ws, wf, wq, wqe, we, cc_mf, cc_qf, wtheta, wthetae, abl_height, wCO2, wCO2e, wCO2M, w_th_ft, w_q_ft, w_CO2_ft)[source]#

Calculate tendency terms for mixed layer variables.

calculate_transition_layer_tendency(lcl, abl_height, cc_frac, dz_h)[source]#

Calculate transition layer thickness tendency.

calculate_vertical_motions(abl_height, dtheta, const)[source]#

Calculate large-scale subsidence and radiative divergence effects.

Return type:

tuple[Array, Array]

calculate_wind_tendencies(we, wf, uw, vw, cc_mf, du, dv, abl_height)[source]#

Calculate wind tendency terms if wind is prognostic.

Return type:

tuple[Array, Array, Array, Array]

integrate(state, dt)[source]#

Integrate mixed layer forward in time.

Return type:

PyTree

run(state, const)[source]#

Calculate mixed layer tendencies and update diagnostic variables.

class abcmodel.mixed_layer.MinimalMixedLayerInitConds(abl_height, surf_pressure, theta, dtheta, wtheta, q, dq, wq, co2, dCO2, wCO2, u, v, dz_h, wstar=1e-06, wCO2A=0.0, wCO2R=0.0, wCO2M=0.0, wqe=0.0, wCO2e=0.0, thetav=nan, wthetav=nan, qsat=nan, e=nan, esat=nan, lcl=nan)[source]#
